Task: Get on a Bike

Steps:
1. Swing your non-dominant leg over the shaft of the bike.
2. Put your dominant foot on the pedal.
3. Hold on to the handlebars for support and to keep the bike straight.
4. Keeping your weight center and even, pedal with your feet.
5. Stopping.

- To get on the bike, swing your non-dominant leg over the shaft of the bike.
- Put your dominant foot on the pedal.
- Hold on to the handlebars for support and to keep the bike straight.
- Keeping your weight center and even, pedal with your feet.
- Stopping.

PDDL Actions:

```lisp
(:action swing_leg_over_bike
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bike)
    :precondition (and (beside ?p ?b) (not (between_legs ?p ?b)))
    :effect (and (between_legs ?p ?b) (not (beside ?p ?b)))
)

(:action put_foot_on_pedal
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bike ?pedal - pedal)
    :precondition (and (between_legs ?p ?b) (not (foot_on_pedal ?p ?pedal)))
    :effect (foot_on_pedal ?p ?pedal)
)

(:action hold_handlebars
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bike)
    :precondition (and (between_legs ?p ?b) (not (holding_handlebars ?p ?b)))
    :effect (holding_handlebars ?p ?b)
)

(:action pedal_bike
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bike ?pedal - pedal)
    :precondition (and (between_legs ?p ?b) (foot_on_pedal ?p ?pedal) (holding_handlebars ?p ?b) (not (in_motion ?b)))
    :effect (in_motion ?b)
)

(:action stop_bike
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - bike)
    :precondition (in_motion ?b)
    :effect (not (in_motion ?b))
)
```

These PDDL actions capture the steps needed to get on a bike and ride it, with appropriate preconditions and effects based on the entity states provided.
